name: Deploying ML models with GKE and GitHub Actions
shortDescription: This project shows how to serve an ONNX-optimized image classification model as a RESTful web service with FastAPI, Docker, and Kubernetes (k8s).
longDescription: This project shows how to serve an ONNX-optimized image classification model as a RESTful web service with FastAPI, Docker, and Kubernetes (k8s).
